SELECT DTS.RSC_ORDER_CODE, DTS.RSC_ORDER_DTL_NO, DTS.RSC_CD_CODE, DTS.RSC_ORDER_VOL,
RSC.RSC_CD_NAME, RSC.RSC_CD_UNIT
FROM BF_RSC_ORDER_DETAILS DTS LEFT JOIN BF_RSC_ORDER OD ON DTS.RSC_ORDER_CODE = OD.RSC_ORDER_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE RSC ON DTS.RSC_CD_CODE = RSC.RSC_CD_CODE
RSC_ORDER_VOL != RSC_ORDER_ARV
AND DTS.RSC_ORDER_CODE LIKE '%' || #{rscOrderCode} || '%'
AND OD.RSC_ORDER_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{rscOrderTitle} || '%'
AND OD.RSC_ORDER_DATE = #{rscOrderDate}
ORDER BY DTS.RSC_ORDER_DTL_NO

SELECT INSP.RSC_INSP_CODE, INSP.RSC_INSP_DATE, INSP.RSC_ORDER_CODE, INSP.RSC_ORDER_DTL_NO, INSP.RSC_CD_CODE, INSP.RSC_INSP_VOL, INSP.RSC_INFER_VOL, INSP.RSC_PASS_VOL, INSP.RSC_INSP_ST, INSP.RSC_INSP_REMK, INSP.EMP_ID,
RSCCODE.RSC_CD_NAME, RSCCODE.RSC_CD_UNIT,
EMP.EMP_NAME
FROM BF_RSC_INSP INSP LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE RSCCODE ON INSP.RSC_CD_CODE = RSCCODE.RSC_CD_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON INSP.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID
INSP.RSC_INSP_CODE LIKE '%'||#{rscInspCode}||'%'
INSP.RSC_CD_CODE = #{rscCdCode}
INSP.RSC_INSP_DATE >= #{rscInspSDate} AND INSP.RSC_INSP_DATE <= #{rscInspEDate}
ORDER BY 1 DESC
